column5: Welcome to the Birth Year Challenge: Part 1, hosted by kynky and featuring his original list. Started: 1/1/25 Watched: 5/34 Completed: 14% For this challenge you can only pick films that were released in the year you were born, according to Letterboxd dates to avoid confusion, and the total amount of films to watch is the same as your current age. There is no time limit on the challenge, only to watch all the films before your next Birthday, or you'll have to add another film! All the films have to be first time watches. Track the tag BYC to read everyone's reviews. Have fun!

column2: Pistol: The Birth of a Legend
